trashslot.configuration.allowDeletionWhi: Allow Deletion While TrashSlot is Invisible
Not recommended, but this will allow you to use the keybinds for deleting items even if the trash slot itself is hidden.
trashslot.configuration.deletionDenyList: List of items that cannot be deleted, in comma-separated format of "modid:name".
trashslot.configuration.enableDeleteKeys: Set to true if you want the delete keybindings to work in creative as well. Note: Items will be deleted permanently in creative, regardless of instantDeletion setting!
trashslot.configuration.enableHints.tool: TrashSlot will show a hint the first time the trash slot is toggled off or can be enabled on a supported screen. Set to false to disable.
This causes the deletion slot to delete items instantly, similar to Creative Mode.
trashslot.configuration.title: TrashSlot
trashslot.hint.locked: Trash slot locked. Press %s to unlock it.
trashslot.hint.toggleOn: Press %s to enable the trash slot for this screen!
trashslot.hint.toggledOff: You've toggled off the trash slot! Press %s to re-enable it.
trashslot.hint.unlocked: Trash slot unlocked. Press %s to lock it.
trashslot.serverNotInstalled: The server does not have TrashSlot installed. This mod will be disabled.
